overview: Musical intended for children  One of the most fun family shows in the country. Algjör Sveppi - A day in the life of a boy adorned themselves Sveppi starring with him on stage Orri Hugin Ágústsson's audience góðkunnugur from the TV pressure. The exhibition is based on a children's album Gisli Runar Total fungus since 1978 long since become classics.
